page.title: 05FARMS NEAR BECKLEY & HORTON
page.content: We went out and interviewed most farmers in our area.The acreage owned ranged from 0-700 acres.The amount of acres rented ranged from 0-950 acres. The amount of arable land goes from 0-400.The most popular crops grown are barley, wheat, and grass. Aprox. half of the farmers sell their crops and the others feed them to their livestock. The acreage used for livestock ranged from 0-450. The number of livestock kept varied from 0-1298. The animals kept are beef cattle, sheep, sows for slaughter, goats and chickens but no milking cattle. There are also cats, dogs, horses and ponies. Important jobs during the year are: Spring - fertilizing, spraying, breeding:Summer - haymaking, combining, spraying: Autumn - cultivating, planting, housing cattle: Winter - feeding & housing animals.
